data.title: Swasthya | Healthcare Web App
data.content: Built a full-stack health monitoring platform integrating real-time wearable data and Python-based image processing to digitize medical records. Secure authentication implemented using JWT tokens.

data.title: Next Cart | E-Commerce Website
data.content: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform with RESTful APIs, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL. Performance optimizations improved checkout conversions by over 28%.

data.title: LSTM Traffic Prediction
data.content: Built an LSTM-based deep learning model using Python and Keras to forecast traffic volume using historical and time-series data. Achieved high accuracy on real-world datasets.

data.title: AI Health Diagnosis System
data.content: Developed a Tkinter-based desktop application that uses A* algorithm to predict diseases from symptoms using a CSV-trained symptom-disease dataset.

data.title: Belas Creation
data.content: Belas Creation offers premium outdoor advertising (hoardings), eco-friendly EV cycle ads, and full-stack digital marketing services. The platform includes footfall analytics and traffic-based ad reporting for effective campaign planning.
